I'm running into an issue with conditional visibilty options for theme fields.
I'm attempting to make a group show/hide based on a boolean field.

Where am I going wrong

You have to use the theme object and also include any parent groups. So the `controlling_field` should use `theme.<parent_group>.<controlling_field>`
Also, you should remove the quotes around `true` on the `controlling_value_regex`
